title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the expected behavior is not observed.
OB: Selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempting to add Javadoc does not result in any action or change.
EB: Adding Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view should trigger the appropriate action, updating the documentation for the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field within the view.
3. Attempt to add Javadoc on the selected field.
